"Darker Storm":
"As you relax after fulfilling the requests
of the Weapons Craftsman Zieg, an alarm
sounds. Darkers are attacking ARKS Ship
128, the Themis. The ARKS are thrown
into a panic by this sudden turn of
events. Soon after, the order to engage
is given, shattering the brief moment of
peace.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated"
